experience.title: web Development Intern
info: Created web pages with responsive design during internship, enhancing user interface accessibility
Efficiently managed codebase using Git, collaborating with backend developers for seamless frontend integration.

experience.title: Specialist Enterprise
info: Collaborated on developing a CRM application for Avery Dennison, tailoring it to meet client requirements.
Implemented an Oracle service cloud mobile app,granting role-based access to 30 users, streamlining client-side operations.
Designed and deployed dashboards and reports to enhance business understanding

experience.title: System Administrator (Deep Learning Class)
info: Managed 20 Linux accounts on a JupyterHub server hosted on Citrix, facilitating collaborative learning among classmates by providing shared resources.

Automated user account creation using a Bash script and integrated a usage monitoring interface into the JupyterHub control panel, ensuring efficient setup and enabling proactive enforcement of usage limits.
